title: Flying Skull
desc:
Post 2016
- Input any number to play this card.
- The next player receives half the inputted number of Card Shards, rounded up.
- If you input a 10, during their next turn, any card they play comes with a 50% chance to instead **Banish** itself, with all effects of the card being nullified.  This effect can only trigger once in that turn.
